title: Forgot Password does not send reset email
description: The Forgot Password function on the sign-in page does not work - no email is sent to reset the password. Note: Sign-in by email link/magic link does work.
notes: Investigation complete: The forgot password feature IS fully implemented (UI, backend, email template, token system). The issue is likely a deployment configuration problem - check: POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN, EMAIL_MODE, ADMIN_EMAIL, NEXTAUTH_URL env vars. The requestReset mutation silently swallows errors for anti-enumeration, so the user sees 'Check Your Email' even if sending fails. Check /admin/communications for PASSWORD_RESET emails and Postmark dashboard for delivery status.
close_reason: Investigation: Feature is fully implemented. Issue is deployment config - check POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN, EMAIL_MODE, ADMIN_EMAIL env vars. The mutation silently returns success even on email failure (anti-enumeration). Check Postmark dashboard and /admin/communications for diagnosis.
